page.title: 13POP MUSIC:THORNTON CLEVELEYS
page.content:
IN 1985,TODAY,PEOPLE ENJOY POP MUSIC MORE THAN CLASSICAL.SOME BANDS RAISE MONEY FOR STARVING COUNTRIES AND MAKE RECORDS TO RAISE MONEY.BANDS LIKE WHAM! TRAVEL ALL OVER THE WORLD AND SING AND PLAY FOR FOREIGN COUNTRIES.
ONLY LAST SATURDAY THE BIGGEST POP CONCERT IN THE WORLD TOOK PLACE.FROM 12 O'CLOCK NOON UNTIL 4 O'CLOCK AM ,ON SUNDAY ,DIFFERENT BANDS LIKE WHAM!,DURAN,DURAN ,AND MADONNA. THERE WERE ALSO BANDS FROM PHILADELPHIA AMERICA,SYDNEY,AUSTRALIA,PLUS A SATTELITE TELEVISION TO PUT THE CONCERT ONTO THEIR SCREEN IN AMERICA ETC.BOB GELDOF FROM BOOMTOWN RATS ORGANISED LIVE AID WHICH WAS WHAT IT WAS CALLED. BY{CLAIRE TAYLOR,STANAH C.P.SCHOOL}
